It does not require thought or discrimination.
What is the use of speaking of hell and heaven?
The four holy ones and the six kinds of beings are all extinguished.
Even if Māra, the demon king, wants to create difficulties,
The vajra jewel sword will cut him off at the head.
The Wang family raises a child who must practice Chan.
This single thought is forever not extinguished.

original: 彈指頓明諸法門釋迦彌勒齊超越。

translated: With a snap of the fingers, one suddenly understands all Dharma gates, surpassing Śākyamuni and Maitreya.
It is like a poisonous drum placed in front of the hall.
With a single beat, all who hear it have their brains split open.
Boundless afflictions are all eliminated.
Past karma and old calamities melt like snow in hot water.
The last phrase is repeated again.
Still and silent, a thousand miles of a single piece of iron.
